alert.note: Alert for Barbour; Nicholas; Pocahontas; Randolph; Webster (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 4:36PM EDT until July 28 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston West Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Randolph County in northeastern West Virginia... Pocahontas County in northeastern West Virginia... Southeastern Nicholas County in southeastern West Virginia... Eastern Webster County in northeastern West Virginia... South central Barbour County in northeastern West Virginia... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 436 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Buckhannon to near Quinwood, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elkins, Richwood, Marlinton, Cass Scenic Railroad, Greenbank, Webster Springs, Addison (Webster Springs), Mill Creek, Snowshoe, Dailey, Mingo, Beverly, Junior, Durbin, Hillsboro, Womelsdorf (Coalton), Huttonsville, Harman, Arbovale, and Cheat Bridge. This includes Route 33 between mile markers 31 and 35. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
